trans-unit.source: Provision Web App with Redis Cache
trans-unit.target: Provision Web App with Redis Cache

trans-unit.source: Use Azure Resource Manager template to deploy web app with Redis Cache.
trans-unit.target: Use Azure Resource Manager template to deploy web app with Redis Cache.

trans-unit.source: Create a Web App plus Redis Cache using a template
trans-unit.target: Create a Web App plus Redis Cache using a template

trans-unit.source: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template that deploys an Azure Web App with Redis cache.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template that deploys an Azure Web App with Redis cache.

trans-unit.source: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and
trans-unit.target: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and

trans-unit.source: how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.
trans-unit.target: how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.

trans-unit.source: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.
trans-unit.target: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating templates, see [Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates](../resource-group-authoring-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about creating templates, see [Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates](../resource-group-authoring-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: For the complete template, see [Web App with Redis Cache template](https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/blob/master/201-web-app-with-redis-cache/azuredeploy.json).
trans-unit.target: For the complete template, see [Web App with Redis Cache template](https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/blob/master/201-web-app-with-redis-cache/azuredeploy.json).

trans-unit.target: What you will deploy

trans-unit.source: In this template, you will deploy:
trans-unit.target: In this template, you will deploy:

trans-unit.target: Azure Web App

trans-unit.target: Azure Redis Cache.

trans-unit.target: To run the deployment automatically, click the following button:

trans-unit.target: eploy to Azure]

trans-unit.source: Parameters to specify
trans-unit.target: Parameters to specify

trans-unit.source: Resources to deploy
trans-unit.target: Resources to deploy

trans-unit.source: Redis Cache
trans-unit.target: Redis Cache

trans-unit.source: Creates the Azure Redics Cache that is used with the web app.
trans-unit.target: Creates the Azure Redics Cache that is used with the web app.

trans-unit.source: The name of the cache is specified in the **redisCacheName** parameter.
trans-unit.target: The name of the cache is specified in the **redisCacheName** parameter.

trans-unit.source: The template creates the cache in the same location as the web app, which is recommended for best performance.
trans-unit.target: The template creates the cache in the same location as the web app, which is recommended for best performance.

trans-unit.source: Web app
trans-unit.target: Web app

trans-unit.source: Creates the web app with name specified in the **siteName** parameter.
trans-unit.target: Creates the web app with name specified in the **siteName** parameter.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the web app is configured with app setting properties that enable it to work with the Redis Cache.
trans-unit.target: Notice that the web app is configured with app setting properties that enable it to work with the Redis Cache.

trans-unit.source: This app settings are dynamically created based on values provided during deployment.
trans-unit.target: This app settings are dynamically created based on values provided during deployment.
